main event: A bright white light was observed descending from a high altitude over Estacado, Texas in June 1954.
interesting points: The object descended rapidly from a very high altitude, traveling from west to east, and came close to the ground, estimated at 120 feet.
The object's speed was estimated to be between 520-630 knots.
When the object slowed down, it made two 180-degree turns before blinking out and disappearing.
The object was observed from an aircraft, with the crew keeping it under observation the entire time.
The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
